amendment.description: Amendment deletes section 216 which provides that none of the funds made available in the bill to the Secretary of the Treasury may be used to publish, implement, administer, or enforce regulations that permit financial institutions to accept the matricula consular identification card as a form of identification.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 216 (relating to identification accepted by financial institutions).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oxley amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 177 (Roll no. 452).
